onActionPerformed.script:
# Sample button click handler
logger = system.util.getLogger("ButtonHandler")
logger.info("Button was clicked!")

# Get current value
value = self.getSibling("TextField1").props.text

if value:
    system.perspective.sendMessage("success", {"message": value})
else:
    system.perspective.sendMessage("error", {"message": "No value entered"})
